local_intent: Perceive the white plate, move above it, perform precise approach and alignment, then verify alignment by checking position at the white_plate target.
assumptions: 0.05 m vertical offset is collision-safe for approach
Alignment success is verifiable via IsAt(white_plate)
coherence_with_global: Matches GLOBAL_BT: uses DetectObject -> MoveAbove(0.05) -> ApproachAndAlign(tol=0.005, 1200 ms) and adds IsAt to verify alignment; detection wrapped with limited retry per failure-and-recovery.
